title: Notes From the Twittergound
description: All this talk of 2+2 on my twitter feed has compelled me to take a deeper look, with the help of Fyodor Dostoevsky, and his book Notes From The Undergound. Not all who are part of this narrative are taking a nefarious angle, some are simply on the academic margins on thought. Take a look and tell me what you think
